name: Eclipse (Sara Martins, Vasco Rodrigues, Isaque Sanches)
name_original: Eclipse (Sara Martins, Vasco Rodrigues, Isaque Sanches)
description:
(Version 1.1 - 19 August 2017)

A journey that starts. Will you have the power to be the same?

This game was made for Ludum Dare 39, by Isaque Sanches, Sara Martins, Tiago Salgado and Vasco Rodrigues.

On the keyboard, use WASD / Arrows and the Mouse to play.

Eclipse is a single player mythical game based on observation and exploration. Traversing a maze, you will find your true power.
